German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From perfect participle of verheiraten (“to marry, get married”).

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /fɛɐ̯ˈhaɪ̯ʁaːtət/
  • Audio
    		(file)
  • Hyphenation: Ver‧hei‧ra‧tet

Adjective[edit]

verheiratet (not comparable)

  1. married (in a state of marriage; having a wife or a husband)

Synonyms[edit]

  • getraut
  • vermählt
